00021 #ifndef _XENO_NUCLEUS_QUEUE_H
00022 #define _XENO_NUCLEUS_QUEUE_H
00023 
00024 #include <nucleus/types.h>
00025 #include <nucleus/core.h>
00026 
00027 /* Basic element holder */
00028 
00029 typedef struct xnholder {
00030 
00031     struct xnholder *next;
00032     struct xnholder *last;
00033 
00034 } xnholder_t;
00035 
00036 static inline void inith (xnholder_t *holder) {
00037     /* Holding queues are doubly-linked and circular */
00038     holder->last = holder;
00039     holder->next = holder;
00040 }
00041 
00042 static inline void ath (xnholder_t *head,
00043                         xnholder_t *holder) {
00044     /* Inserts the new element right after the heading one  */
00045     holder->last = head;
00046     holder->next = head->next;
00047     holder->next->last = holder;
00048     head->next = holder;
00049 }
00050 
00051 static inline void dth (xnholder_t *holder) {
00052     holder->last->next = holder->next;
00053     holder->next->last = holder->last;
00054 }
00055 
00056 /* Basic element queue */
00057 
00058 typedef struct xnqueue {
00059 
00060     xnholder_t head;
00061     int elems;
00062 #if defined(__KERNEL__) && defined(CONFIG_XENO_OPT_DEBUG_QUEUES) && defined(CONFIG_SMP)
00063     xnlock_t lock;
00064 #endif /* __KERNEL__ && CONFIG_XENO_OPT_DEBUG_QUEUES && CONFIG_SMP */
00065 
00066 } xnqueue_t;
00067 
00068 #if defined(CONFIG_XENO_OPT_DEBUG_QUEUES) && defined(CONFIG_SMP)
00069 #define DECLARE_XNQUEUE(q) xnqueue_t q = { { &(q).head, &(q).head }, 0, XNARCH_LOCK_UNLOCKED }
00070 #else /* !(CONFIG_XENO_OPT_DEBUG_QUEUES && CONFIG_SMP) */
00071 #define DECLARE_XNQUEUE(q) xnqueue_t q = { { &(q).head, &(q).head }, 0 }
00072 #endif /* CONFIG_XENO_OPT_DEBUG_QUEUES && CONFIG_SMP */
00073 
00074 static inline void initq (xnqueue_t *qslot) {
00075     inith(&qslot->head);
00076     qslot->elems = 0;
00077 #if defined(__KERNEL__) && defined(CONFIG_XENO_OPT_DEBUG_QUEUES) && defined(CONFIG_SMP)
00078     xnlock_init(&qslot->lock);
00079 #endif /* __KERNEL__ && CONFIG_XENO_OPT_DEBUG_QUEUES && CONFIG_SMP */
00080 }
00081 
00082 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_DEBUG_QUEUES
00083 
00084 #if defined(__KERNEL__) || defined(__XENO_UVM__) || defined(__XENO_SIM__)
00085 
00086 #define XENO_DEBUG_CHECK_QUEUE(__qslot)         \
00087 do { \
00088     xnholder_t *curr; \
00089     spl_t s; \
00090     int nelems = 0; \
00091     xnlock_get_irqsave(&(__qslot)->lock,s);     \
00092     curr = (__qslot)->head.last;                                  \
00093     while (curr != &(__qslot)->head && nelems < (__qslot)->elems)       \
00094         curr = curr->last, nelems++; \
00095     if (curr != &(__qslot)->head || nelems != (__qslot)->elems)   \
00096         xnpod_fatal("corrupted queue, qslot->elems=%d, qslot=%p at %s:%d", \
00097                     (__qslot)->elems,                             \
00098                     __qslot,                                      \
00099                     __FILE__,__LINE__);                           \
00100     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&(__qslot)->lock,s);  \
00101 } while(0)
00102 
00103 #define XENO_DEBUG_INSERT_QUEUE(__qslot,__holder)               \
00104 do { \
00105     xnholder_t *curr; \
00106     spl_t s; \
00107     xnlock_get_irqsave(&(__qslot)->lock,s);     \
00108     curr = (__qslot)->head.last;                           \
00109     while (curr != &(__qslot)->head && (__holder) != curr)      \
00110         curr = curr->last; \
00111     if (curr == (__holder))                                         \
00112         xnpod_fatal("inserting element twice, holder=%p, qslot=%p at %s:%d", \
00113                     __holder, \
00114                     __qslot, \
00115                     __FILE__,__LINE__); \
00116     if ((__holder)->last == NULL)                                  \
00117         xnpod_fatal("holder=%p not initialized, qslot=%p", \
00118                     __holder, \
00119                     __qslot); \
00120     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&(__qslot)->lock,s);  \
00121 } while(0)
00122 
00123 #define XENO_DEBUG_REMOVE_QUEUE(__qslot,__holder)       \
00124 do { \
00125     xnholder_t *curr; \
00126     spl_t s; \
00127     xnlock_get_irqsave(&(__qslot)->lock,s);     \
00128     curr = (__qslot)->head.last;                           \
00129     while (curr != &(__qslot)->head && (__holder) != curr)      \
00130         curr = curr->last; \
00131     if (curr == &(__qslot)->head)                                               \
00132         xnpod_fatal("removing non-linked element, holder=%p, qslot=%p at %s:%d", \
00133                     __holder, \
00134                     __qslot,    \
00135                     __FILE__,__LINE__); \
00136     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&(__qslot)->lock,s);  \
00137 } while(0)
00138 
00139 #else /* !(__KERNEL__ || __XENO_UVM__ || __XENO_SIM__) */
00140 
00141 /* Disable queue checks in user-space code which does not run as part
00142    of any virtual machine, e.g. skin call interface libs. */
00143 
00144 #define XENO_DEBUG_CHECK_QUEUE(__qslot)
00145 #define XENO_DEBUG_INSERT_QUEUE(__qslot,__holder)
00146 #define XENO_DEBUG_REMOVE_QUEUE(__qslot,__holder)
00147 
00148 #endif /* __KERNEL__ || __XENO_UVM__ || __XENO_SIM__ */
00149 
00150 /* Write the following as macros so that line numbering information
00151    keeps pointing at the real caller in diagnosis messages. */
00152 
00153 #define insertq(__qslot,__head,__holder)        \
00154 ({ XENO_DEBUG_CHECK_QUEUE(__qslot);             \
00155    XENO_DEBUG_INSERT_QUEUE(__qslot,__holder);   \
00156    ath((__head)->last,__holder);                \
00157    ++(__qslot)->elems; })
00158 
00159 #define prependq(__qslot,__holder)              \
00160 ({ XENO_DEBUG_CHECK_QUEUE(__qslot);             \
00161    XENO_DEBUG_INSERT_QUEUE(__qslot,__holder);   \
00162    ath(&(__qslot)->head,__holder);              \
00163    ++(__qslot)->elems; })
00164 
00165 #define appendq(__qslot,__holder)               \
00166 ({ XENO_DEBUG_CHECK_QUEUE(__qslot);             \
00167    XENO_DEBUG_INSERT_QUEUE(__qslot,__holder);   \
00168    ath((__qslot)->head.last,__holder);          \
00169    ++(__qslot)->elems; })
00170 
00171 #define removeq(__qslot,__holder)               \
00172 ({ XENO_DEBUG_CHECK_QUEUE(__qslot);             \
00173    XENO_DEBUG_REMOVE_QUEUE(__qslot,__holder);   \
00174    dth(__holder);                               \
00175    --(__qslot)->elems; })
00176 
00177 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_DEBUG_QUEUES */
00178 
00179 static inline int insertq (xnqueue_t *qslot,
00180                            xnholder_t *head,
00181                            xnholder_t *holder)
00182 {
00183     /* Insert the <holder> element before <head> */
00184     ath(head->last,holder);
00185     return ++qslot->elems;
00186 }
00187 
00188 static inline int prependq (xnqueue_t *qslot,
00189                             xnholder_t *holder)
00190 {
00191     /* Prepend the element to the queue */
00192     ath(&qslot->head,holder);
00193     return ++qslot->elems;
00194 }
00195 
00196 static inline int appendq (xnqueue_t *qslot,
00197                            xnholder_t *holder)
00198 {
00199     /* Append the element to the queue */
00200     ath(qslot->head.last,holder);
00201     return ++qslot->elems;
00202 }
00203 
00204 static inline int removeq (xnqueue_t *qslot,
00205                            xnholder_t *holder)
00206 {
00207     dth(holder);
00208     return --qslot->elems;
00209 }
00210 
00211 #endif /* CONFIG_XENO_OPT_DEBUG_QUEUES */
00212 
00213 static inline xnholder_t *getheadq (xnqueue_t *qslot)
00214 {
00215     xnholder_t *holder = qslot->head.next;
00216     if (holder == &qslot->head) return NULL;
00217     return holder;
00218 }
00219 
00220 static inline xnholder_t *getq (xnqueue_t *qslot)
00221 {
00222     xnholder_t *holder = getheadq(qslot);
00223     if (holder) removeq(qslot,holder);
00224     return holder;
00225 }
00226 
00227 static inline xnholder_t *nextq (xnqueue_t *qslot,
00228                                  xnholder_t *holder)
00229 {
00230     xnholder_t *nextholder = holder->next;
00231     return nextholder == &qslot->head ? NULL : nextholder;
00232 }
00233 
00234 static inline xnholder_t *popq (xnqueue_t *qslot,
00235                                 xnholder_t *holder)
00236 {
00237     xnholder_t *nextholder = nextq(qslot,holder);
00238     removeq(qslot,holder);
00239     return nextholder;
00240 }
00241 
00242 static inline int countq (xnqueue_t *qslot)
00243 {
00244     return qslot->elems;
00245 }
00246 
00247 static inline int moveq (xnqueue_t *dstq, xnqueue_t *srcq)
00248 {
00249     xnholder_t *headsrc = srcq->head.next;
00250     xnholder_t *tailsrc = srcq->head.last->last;
00251     xnholder_t *headdst = &dstq->head;
00252 
00253     headsrc->last->next = tailsrc->next;
00254     tailsrc->next->last = headsrc->last;
00255     headsrc->last = headdst;
00256     tailsrc->next = headdst->next;
00257     headdst->next->last = tailsrc;
00258     headdst->next = headsrc;
00259     dstq->elems += srcq->elems;
00260     srcq->elems = 0;
00261 
00262     return dstq->elems;
00263 }
00264 
00265 /* Prioritized element holder */
00266 
00267 typedef struct xnpholder {
00268 
00269     xnholder_t plink;
00270     int prio;
00271 
00272 } xnpholder_t;
00273 
00274 static inline void initph (xnpholder_t *holder)
00275 {
00276     inith(&holder->plink);
00277     /* Priority is set upon queue insertion */
00278 }
00279 
00280 /* Prioritized element queue */
00281 
00282 #define xnqueue_up   (-1)
00283 #define xnqueue_down   1
00284 
00285 typedef struct xnpqueue {
00286 
00287     xnqueue_t pqueue;
00288     int qdir;
00289 
00290 } xnpqueue_t;
00291 
00292 static inline void initpq (xnpqueue_t *pqslot,
00293                            int qdir,
00294                            int maxpri)
00295 {
00296     initq(&pqslot->pqueue);
00297     pqslot->qdir = qdir;
00298 }
00299 
00300 static inline int insertpq (xnpqueue_t *pqslot,
00301                             xnpholder_t *head,
00302                             xnpholder_t *holder)
00303 {
00304     /* Insert the <holder> element before <head> */
00305     return insertq(&pqslot->pqueue,&head->plink,&holder->plink);
00306 }
00307 
00308 static inline int insertpqf (xnpqueue_t *pqslot,
00309                              xnpholder_t *holder,
00310                              int prio)
00311 {
00312     /* Insert the element at the end of its priority group (FIFO) */
00313 
00314     xnholder_t *curr;
00315 
00316     if (pqslot->qdir == xnqueue_down) {
00317         for (curr = pqslot->pqueue.head.last;
00318              curr != &pqslot->pqueue.head; curr = curr->last) {
00319                 if (prio <= ((xnpholder_t *)curr)->prio)
00320                     break;
00321         }
00322     }
00323     else {
00324         for (curr = pqslot->pqueue.head.last;
00325              curr != &pqslot->pqueue.head; curr = curr->last) {
00326                 if (prio >= ((xnpholder_t *)curr)->prio)
00327                     break;
00328         }
00329     }
00330 
00331     holder->prio = prio;
00332 
00333     return insertq(&pqslot->pqueue,curr->next,&holder->plink);
00334 }
00335 
00336 static inline int insertpql (xnpqueue_t *pqslot,
00337                              xnpholder_t *holder,
00338                              int prio)
00339 {
00340     /* Insert the element at the front of its priority group (LIFO) */
00341 
00342     xnholder_t *curr;
00343 
00344     if (pqslot->qdir == xnqueue_down) {
00345         for (curr = pqslot->pqueue.head.next;
00346              curr != &pqslot->pqueue.head; curr = curr->next) {
00347                 if (prio >= ((xnpholder_t *)curr)->prio)
00348                     break;
00349         }
00350     }
00351     else {
00352         for (curr = pqslot->pqueue.head.next;
00353              curr != &pqslot->pqueue.head; curr = curr->next) {
00354                 if (prio <= ((xnpholder_t *)curr)->prio)
00355                     break;
00356         }
00357     }
00358 
00359     holder->prio = prio;
00360 
00361     return insertq(&pqslot->pqueue,curr,&holder->plink);
00362 }
00363 
00364 static inline xnpholder_t *findpqh (xnpqueue_t *pqslot,
00365                                     int prio)
00366 {
00367     /* Find the element heading a given priority group */
00368 
00369     xnholder_t *curr;
00370 
00371     if (pqslot->qdir == xnqueue_down) {
00372         for (curr = pqslot->pqueue.head.next;
00373              curr != &pqslot->pqueue.head; curr = curr->next) {
00374                 if (prio >= ((xnpholder_t *)curr)->prio)
00375                     break;
00376         }
00377     }
00378     else {
00379         for (curr = pqslot->pqueue.head.next;
00380              curr != &pqslot->pqueue.head; curr = curr->next) {
00381                 if (prio <= ((xnpholder_t *)curr)->prio)
00382                     break;
00383         }
00384     }
00385 
00386     if (curr && ((xnpholder_t *)curr)->prio == prio)
00387         return (xnpholder_t *)curr;
00388 
00389     return NULL;
00390 }
00391 
00392 static inline int appendpq (xnpqueue_t *pqslot,
00393                             xnpholder_t *holder)
00394 {
00395     holder->prio = 0;
00396     return appendq(&pqslot->pqueue,&holder->plink);
00397 }
00398 
00399 static inline int prependpq (xnpqueue_t *pqslot,
00400                              xnpholder_t *holder)
00401 {
00402     holder->prio = 0;
00403     return prependq(&pqslot->pqueue,&holder->plink);
00404 }
00405 
00406 static inline int removepq (xnpqueue_t *pqslot,
00407                             xnpholder_t *holder)
00408 {
00409     return removeq(&pqslot->pqueue,&holder->plink);
00410 }
00411 
00412 static inline xnpholder_t *getheadpq (xnpqueue_t *pqslot)
00413 {
00414     return (xnpholder_t *)getheadq(&pqslot->pqueue);
00415 }
00416 
00417 static inline xnpholder_t *nextpq (xnpqueue_t *pqslot,
00418                                    xnpholder_t *holder)
00419 {
00420     return (xnpholder_t *)nextq(&pqslot->pqueue,&holder->plink);
00421 }
00422 
00423 static inline xnpholder_t *getpq (xnpqueue_t *pqslot)
00424 {
00425     return (xnpholder_t *)getq(&pqslot->pqueue);
00426 }
00427 
00428 static inline xnpholder_t *poppq (xnpqueue_t *pqslot,
00429                                   xnpholder_t *holder)
00430 {
00431     return (xnpholder_t *)popq(&pqslot->pqueue,&holder->plink);
00432 }
00433 
00434 static inline int countpq (xnpqueue_t *pqslot)
00435 {
00436     return countq(&pqslot->pqueue);
00437 }
00438 
00439 /* Generic prioritized element holder */
00440 
00441 typedef struct xngholder {
00442 
00443     xnpholder_t glink;
00444     void *data;
00445 
00446 } xngholder_t;
00447 
00448 static inline void initgh (xngholder_t *holder, void *data)
00449 {
00450     inith(&holder->glink.plink);
00451     holder->data = data;
00452 }
00453 
00454 /* Generic element queue */
00455 
00456 typedef struct xngqueue {
00457 
00458     xnpqueue_t gqueue;
00459     xnqueue_t *freehq;
00460     void (*starvation)(xnqueue_t *);
00461     int threshold;
00462 
00463 } xngqueue_t;
00464 
00465 static inline void initgq (xngqueue_t *gqslot,
00466                            xnqueue_t *freehq,
00467                            void (*starvation)(xnqueue_t *),
00468                            int threshold,
00469                            int qdir,
00470                            int maxpri)
00471 {
00472     initpq(&gqslot->gqueue,qdir,maxpri);
00473     gqslot->freehq = freehq;
00474     gqslot->starvation = starvation;
00475     gqslot->threshold = threshold;
00476 }
00477 
00478 static inline xngholder_t *allocgh (xngqueue_t *gqslot)
00479 {
00480     if (countq(gqslot->freehq) < gqslot->threshold)
00481         gqslot->starvation(gqslot->freehq);
00482 
00483     return (xngholder_t *)getq(gqslot->freehq);
00484 }
00485 
00486 static inline void *removegh (xngqueue_t *gqslot,
00487                               xngholder_t *holder)
00488 {
00489     removepq(&gqslot->gqueue,&holder->glink);
00490     appendq(gqslot->freehq,&holder->glink.plink);
00491     return holder->data;
00492 }
00493 
00494 static inline int insertgqf (xngqueue_t *gqslot,
00495                              void *data,
00496                              int prio)
00497 {
00498     xngholder_t *holder = allocgh(gqslot);
00499     holder->data = data;
00500     return insertpqf(&gqslot->gqueue,&holder->glink,prio);
00501 }
00502 
00503 static inline int insertgql (xngqueue_t *gqslot,
00504                              void *data,
00505                              int prio)
00506 {
00507     xngholder_t *holder = allocgh(gqslot);
00508     holder->data = data;
00509     return insertpql(&gqslot->gqueue,&holder->glink,prio);
00510 }
00511 
00512 static inline int appendgq (xngqueue_t *gqslot,
00513                             void *data)
00514 {
00515     xngholder_t *holder = allocgh(gqslot);
00516     holder->data = data;
00517     return appendpq(&gqslot->gqueue,&holder->glink);
00518 }
00519 
00520 static inline int prependgq (xngqueue_t *gqslot,
00521                              void *data)
00522 {
00523     xngholder_t *holder = allocgh(gqslot);
00524     holder->data = data;
00525     return prependpq(&gqslot->gqueue,&holder->glink);
00526 }
00527 
00528 static inline xngholder_t *getheadgq (xngqueue_t *gqslot)
00529 {
00530     return (xngholder_t *)getheadpq(&gqslot->gqueue);
00531 }
00532 
00533 static inline xngholder_t *nextgq (xngqueue_t *gqslot,
00534                                    xngholder_t *holder)
00535 {
00536     return (xngholder_t *)nextpq(&gqslot->gqueue,&holder->glink);
00537 }
00538 
00539 static inline void *getgq (xngqueue_t *gqslot)
00540 {
00541     xngholder_t *holder = getheadgq(gqslot);
00542     if (!holder) return NULL;
00543     appendq(gqslot->freehq,&getpq(&gqslot->gqueue)->plink);
00544     return holder->data;
00545 }
00546 
00547 static inline xngholder_t *popgq (xngqueue_t *gqslot,
00548                                   xngholder_t *holder)
00549 {
00550     xngholder_t *nextholder = nextgq(gqslot,holder);
00551     removegh(gqslot,holder);
00552     return nextholder;
00553 }
00554 
00555 static inline xngholder_t *findgq (xngqueue_t *gqslot,
00556                                    void *data)
00557 {
00558     xnholder_t *holder;
00559 
00560     for (holder = gqslot->gqueue.pqueue.head.next;
00561          holder != &gqslot->gqueue.pqueue.head; holder = holder->next) {
00562          if (((xngholder_t *)holder)->data == data)
00563              return (xngholder_t *)holder;
00564         }
00565 
00566     return NULL;
00567 }
00568 
00569 static inline void *removegq (xngqueue_t *gqslot,
00570                               void *data)
00571 {
00572     xngholder_t *holder = findgq(gqslot,data);
00573     return holder ? removegh(gqslot,holder) : NULL;
00574 }
00575 
00576 static inline int countgq (xngqueue_t *gqslot)
00577 {
00578     return countpq(&gqslot->gqueue);
00579 }
00580 
00581 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_SCALABLE_SCHED
00582 
00583 /* Multi-level priority queue, suitable for handling the runnable
00584    thread queue. */
00585 
00586 #if BITS_PER_LONG * BITS_PER_LONG < XNCORE_NR_PRIO
00587 #error "Internal bitmap cannot hold so many priority levels"
00588 #endif
00589 
00590 #define __MLQ_LONGS ((XNCORE_NR_PRIO+BITS_PER_LONG-1)/BITS_PER_LONG)
00591 
00592 typedef struct xnmlqueue {
00593 
00594     int qdir, maxpri;
00595 
00596     unsigned elems;
00597 
00598     u_long himap,
00599            lomap[__MLQ_LONGS];
00600 
00601     struct xnqueue queue[XNCORE_NR_PRIO];
00602 
00603 } xnmlqueue_t;
00604 
00605 #undef __MLQ_LONGS
00606 
00607 static inline unsigned countmlq(xnmlqueue_t *mlqslot)
00608 {
00609     return mlqslot->elems;
00610 }
00611 
00612 static inline unsigned indexmlq(xnmlqueue_t *mlqslot, int prio)
00613 {
00614     if (mlqslot->qdir == xnqueue_up) /* minprio > maxprio */
00615         return prio - mlqslot->maxpri;
00616     else
00617         return mlqslot->maxpri - prio;
00618 }
00619 
00620 static inline unsigned ffsmlq(xnmlqueue_t *mlqslot)
00621 {
00622     int hi = ffnz(mlqslot->himap);
00623     int lo = ffnz(mlqslot->lomap[hi]);
00624     return hi * BITS_PER_LONG + lo; /* Result is undefined if none set. */
00625 }
00626 
00627 static inline void initmlq(xnmlqueue_t *mlqslot, int qdir, int maxpri)
00628 {
00629     int i;
00630 
00631     mlqslot->elems = 0;
00632     mlqslot->qdir  = qdir;
00633     mlqslot->maxpri = maxpri;
00634     mlqslot->himap = 0;
00635     memset(&mlqslot->lomap,0,sizeof(mlqslot->lomap));
00636     
00637     for (i = 0; i < XNCORE_NR_PRIO; i++)
00638         initq(&mlqslot->queue[i]);
00639 }
00640 
00641 #define XNMLQUEUE_APPEND   0
00642 #define XNMLQUEUE_PREPEND  1
00643 
00644 static inline void addmlq(xnmlqueue_t *mlqslot,
00645                           xnpholder_t  *holder,
00646                           unsigned idx,
00647                           int mode)
00648 {
00649     xnqueue_t *queue = &mlqslot->queue[idx];
00650     int hi = idx / BITS_PER_LONG;
00651     int lo = idx % BITS_PER_LONG;
00652 
00653     if (mode == XNMLQUEUE_PREPEND) /* Hopefully, this should be optimized away. */
00654         prependq(queue, &holder->plink);
00655     else
00656         appendq(queue, &holder->plink);
00657 
00658     mlqslot->elems++;
00659     __setbits(mlqslot->himap,1 << hi);
00660     __setbits(mlqslot->lomap[hi],1 << lo);
00661 }
00662 
00663 static inline void insertmlql(xnmlqueue_t *mlqslot,
00664                               xnpholder_t *holder,
00665                               int prio)
00666 {
00667     addmlq(mlqslot, holder, indexmlq(mlqslot,prio), XNMLQUEUE_PREPEND);
00668     holder->prio = prio;
00669 }
00670 
00671 static inline void insertmlqf(xnmlqueue_t *mlqslot,
00672                               xnpholder_t *holder,
00673                               int prio)
00674 {
00675     addmlq(mlqslot, holder, indexmlq(mlqslot,prio), XNMLQUEUE_APPEND);
00676     holder->prio = prio;
00677 }
00678 
00679 static inline void appendmlq(xnmlqueue_t *mlqslot,
00680                              xnpholder_t *holder)
00681 {
00682     addmlq(mlqslot, holder, mlqslot->maxpri, XNMLQUEUE_APPEND);
00683     holder->prio = mlqslot->maxpri;
00684 }
00685 
00686 static inline void prependmlq(xnmlqueue_t *mlqslot,
00687                               xnpholder_t *holder)
00688 {
00689     addmlq(mlqslot, holder, 0, XNMLQUEUE_PREPEND);
00690     holder->prio = 0;
00691 }
00692 
00693 static inline void removemlq(xnmlqueue_t *mlqslot,
00694                              xnpholder_t *holder)
00695 {
00696     unsigned idx = indexmlq(mlqslot,holder->prio);
00697     xnqueue_t *queue = &mlqslot->queue[idx];
00698 
00699     mlqslot->elems--;
00700     
00701     removeq(queue, &holder->plink);
00702     
00703     if (!countq(queue)) {
00704         int hi = idx / BITS_PER_LONG;
00705         int lo = idx % BITS_PER_LONG;
00706         __clrbits(mlqslot->lomap[hi],1 << lo);
00707         if (mlqslot->lomap[hi] == 0)
00708             __clrbits(mlqslot->himap,1 << hi);
00709     }
00710 }
00711 
00712 static inline xnpholder_t *findmlqh(xnmlqueue_t *mlqslot,
00713                                     int prio)
00714 {
00715     xnqueue_t *queue = &mlqslot->queue[indexmlq(mlqslot,prio)];
00716     return (xnpholder_t *)getheadq(queue);
00717 }
00718 
00719 static inline xnpholder_t *getheadmlq(xnmlqueue_t *mlqslot)
00720 {
00721     xnqueue_t *queue;
00722 
00723     if (!countmlq(mlqslot))
00724         return NULL;
00725 
00726     queue = &mlqslot->queue[ffsmlq(mlqslot)];
00727     
00728     return (xnpholder_t *)getheadq(queue);
00729 }
00730 
00731 static inline xnpholder_t *getmlq(xnmlqueue_t *mlqslot)
00732 {
00733     unsigned idx;
00734     xnholder_t *holder;
00735     xnqueue_t *queue;
00736     int hi, lo;
00737 
00738     if (!countmlq(mlqslot))
00739         return NULL;
00740 
00741     idx = ffsmlq(mlqslot);
00742     queue = &mlqslot->queue[idx];
00743     holder = getq(queue);
00744 
00745 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_DEBUG_QUEUES
00746     if (!holder)
00747         xnpod_fatal("corrupted multi-level queue, qslot=%p at %s:%d",
00748                     mlqslot,
00749                     __FILE__,__LINE__);
00750 #endif /* CONFIG_XENO_OPT_DEBUG_QUEUES */
00751         
00752     hi = idx / BITS_PER_LONG;
00753     lo = idx % BITS_PER_LONG;
00754 
00755     mlqslot->elems--;    
00756 
00757     if (!countq(queue)) {
00758         __clrbits(mlqslot->lomap[hi],1 << lo);
00759         if (mlqslot->lomap[hi] == 0)
00760             __clrbits(mlqslot->himap,1 << hi);
00761     }
00762     
00763     return (xnpholder_t *)holder;
00764 }
00765 
00766 #endif /* CONFIG_XENO_OPT_SCALABLE_SCHED */
00767 
00768 #endif /* !_XENO_NUCLEUS_QUEUE_H */
